metadata.title: CVE-2020-23330 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 version 06c39d9. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the AP4_Stz2Atom::GetSampleSize component located in /Core/Ap4Stz2Atom.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause a denial of service (DOS).

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
